resources.string: Grilled chicken marinated in a zesty mango-chipotle glaze
Sliced and seared chipotle-seasoned flank steak
Stir-fried shrimp with Thai basil and lemongrass
Roasted chickpeas seasoned with Mediterranean spices
Slow-cooked Kalua pork with pineapple and ginger
Shredded buffalo chicken with a hint of blue cheese
Smoked and shredded brisket with a smoky barbecue rub
Roasted sweet potato and black bean mash
